title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example has excessive flashing. This bug report is to investigate why.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it is observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash excessively.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only
3. Observe if the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames are flashing excessively
